subject: Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Beneficiary
YOUR COMPENSATION FUNDS FROM NEW GOVERNMENT OF UK LONDON,
This is to officially bring to your notice that the New government of
UK London have decided to compensate all the scam victims with 3
millions British pound each (THREE MILLIONS BRITISH POUNDS ONLY) You
are listed and approved for this payment as one of the scammed victims
and to be paid this amount, get back to me as soon as possible for the
immediate payments of your 3 MILLION BRITISH POUNDS compensations
funds.
On these faithful recommendations, we want you to know that during the
last U.N meetings held IN AFRICA, it was alarmed so much by the world
in the meetings on the loss of funds by various individuals to the
scams artists operating in syndicates all over the world today. In
order to compensate scams victims, the Africans Body in
conjunction with the U.N Government is now paying a total 150 victims
of this operator 3 millions British pounds each in accordance with the
U.N. recommendations.
Due to the corrupt and inefficient Banking Systems, your payments are
be supervised by the United Nations Officials and the CORIS BANK and
Finance International Bank as the corresponding paying office,
According to the number of
applicants at hand, 114 Beneficiaries have already been paid, half of
the victims are from the United States, and India. We still have more
36 victims left to be paid their (THREE MILLIONS BRITISH POUNDS)
compensations funds.
For the claiming of your compensation 3 Millions British Pounds
through the credited MASTER CARD and pin code, kindly feel free to
contact our approved private officer from U.N  Name: Madam Mrs. Jenn
Jezzy Email:
(
leevicy25@gmail.com
) She will instruct what you will do in order to
successfully transfer your compensation amount to you.
You will receive your Compensation amount through a loaded master card
payment or through Coris trust credit online bank. This is the two
paying options approved by the UK LONDON Government; you will be
detailed with modalities as soon as you contact the assigned approved
U.N Delegate officer of the U.N and Finance International Bank.
Finally you are free to decide how you would like your compensation of
3 millions British pounds funds to be paid to you as soon as possible.
Sincerely Yours
Mrs Ellen lawson,

subject: Re:    Dear Beneficiary
body:
Dear Mrs. Ellen Lawson,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the compensation for scam victims. I appreciate your efforts in helping those who have been affected by these unfortunate situations. 

I would like to know more about the process of receiving the funds. Could you please provide me with some additional information? How do I qualify for this compensation? Are there any specific requirements or documents that I need to provide?

Furthermore, could you explain how the loaded MasterCard payment option works? Is it a physical card that will be sent to me, or is it a virtual card that can be used for online transactions? 

I look forward to hearing from you soon and learning more about this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Florence

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
*Greetings Mrs. Florence, Yes I was instructed by the U.N Government to
send you your compensation funds worth a sum of [GBP3,000,000.00]THREE
MILLION BRITISH POUNDS.Please do fill this information so that we will not
send your compensation funds to the wrong person.1. Name in
full...............2. Address....................3.
Nationality....................4. Age/Sex.......................5.
Occupation...........................6.
Phone.............................7. Present
Country.........................8. Email
address................................THe physical card will be sent to
you by DHL COURIER COMPANY with the PIN CODE so that as soon as you receive
the physical card you will start immediately to make use of it to withdraw
money from any ATM CARD MACHINE in your City ok.Thanks and waiting for your
urgent response.Best RegardMadam Mrs. Jenn Jezzypayment Officer In control,*

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Florence,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you provided about the government instructing you to send me funds. Could you please clarify which government agency or department is responsible for this? I just want to make sure everything is legitimate.

Also, could you explain how the funds will be transferred to me? Will it be through a bank transfer or some other method? And what are the next steps I need to take in order to receive the funds?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Florence

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,*
body:
*Greetings,The government agency or department that is responsible
are,MINISTER OF SPORT MINISTER OF JUSTICE MINISTER OF DEFENCE. please send
your details for the safe delivery of your compensation funds by ATM MASTER
CARD.1. Name in full...............2. Address....................3.
Nationality....................4. Age/Sex.......................5.
Occupation...........................6.
Phone.............................7. Present
Country.........................8. Email
address................................Thanks and waiting for your urgent
response.Best RegardMadam Mrs. Jenn Jezzypayment Officer In control,*

subject: Re: Dear Beneficiary,*
body:
Hello Mrs. Jenn Officer In control,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the government agency or department. I appreciate your message and would like to learn more about it. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. Which specific government agency or department are you representing?
2. What is the purpose of this communication? Are there any specific funds that need to be delivered?
3. How does the delivery of funds through an ATM MASTER Name work?
4. Can you please explain how my personal details, such as my name, age, present email, are relevant to this process?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon with more details.

Best wishes,
Florence
